hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
VERSION="1.2.0_112"
print Rebuilding DB to version ${VERSION} print print
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
print Beginning Rebuild from scratch on DB print ------------------------------------ print
./deployRebuildDb.sh -a oss_bar -i oss_bar -r ${VERSION} -e 10.13.18.115 -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.119:1522:SCRUM001" -p SC1_OSS_BAR -u SC1_OSS_BAR -v
